attribute_definitions.description: Attributes with the group displayed when expand=definition

default_value.description: The default value of this attribute. It can be updated, but not created.

description.description: A description of the attribute value.

display_value.description:
A display name that can be used to present this value in
 the user interface. For example, the value might be '1' but the display
 name might be 'Order Exported'.

id.description: The ID of the attribute value.

position.description: The position of the attribute value within the set of attribute values.

description.description: The localized description of the attribute.

display_name.description: The localized name presented to the user in forms.

effective_id.description: The effective ID, which is c_id if the attribute is custom, and just the id otherwise. It is read only.

externally_defined.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is externally defined.

externally_managed.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is externally managed.

field_height.description: The height of the field for this attribute in the editor.

field_length.description: The length of the field for this attribute in the editor.

id.description: The user supplied ID of the attribute.

key.description: Flag indicating if this is a key attribute.

link.description: The URL that is used to get this instance.  Value is computed and read-only.

localizable.description: Flag indicating if this attribute can be localized.

mandatory.description: Flag indicating if a value is mandatory for the attribute.

max_value.description: The maximum possible value for this attribute.

min_length.description: The minimum length of the field for this attribute.

min_value.description: The minimum possible value for this attribute.

multi_value_type.description:
True if the attribute can have multiple values.
 Attributes of the following types are multi-value capable:
 
 set_of_int
 set_of_number
 set_of_string
 
 Additionally, attributes of the following types can be multi-value
 enabled:
 
 enum_of_int
 enum_of_string

order_required.description:
Flag indicating if this attribute is required for order of the attribute model's product. The set of these can be used
 in order line items.

queryable.description:
Returns true if the attribute definition is explicitly marked queryable. If no explicit queryable is found
 and the attribute value type belongs to a queryable type, true is returned too. In all other cases false is returned.
 Value is computed and read-only.

read_only.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is read-only. It is read only.

regular_expression.description: A regular expression that defines the legal values for this attribute.

requires_encoding.description: Flag indicating if this attribute can be encoded using the encoding="off" flag in ISML templates. It is read only.

scale.description: The minimum number of fraction digits for a value of this attribute.

searchable.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is searchable.

set_value_type.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is of type 'Set of'. It is read only.

site_specific.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is site-specific.

system.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is a system attribute.

unit.description: The unit of measure for this attribute.

value_definitions.description: A set of values that are possible for this attribute. It is read only.

description.description: A description of the attribute value.

display_value.description:
A display name that can be used to present this value in
 the user interface. For example, the value might be '1' but the display
 name might be 'Order Exported'.

id.description: The ID of the attribute value.

position.description: The position of the attribute value within the set of attribute values.

visible.description: Flag indicating if this attribute is visible.

attribute_definitions_count.description: The count of the attributes within the group.  This is a computed attribute and is read-only

description.description: The free-form text description of the group by locale

display_name.description: The name used to display the group by locale.

id.description: The group's user specified identifier, used to retrieve the group

internal.description: True if the group is meant only for internal use, false otherwise.  This property is read-only.

link.description: URL that is used to get this instance.  This is a computed attribute and is read-only

position.description: The position of the group relative to other groups.
